posts.post_content:
Hey guys who need to complain about this: Remember all those spells that destroy artifacts and enchantments that no one uses because no one runs kickass artifacts or enchantments? Well, this is a set loaded with artifacts and some kickass enchantments. Suck it up and grab some [Naturalize](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Naturalize). And some [Revoke Existence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Revoke Existence).. and maybe [Nature's Claim](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nature's Claim) just to be safe.  
  
@Bioprince: Read it again. There's more to Asceticism than just regeneration. None of your creatures can be targeted by the enemy when this is out. Sorry, [Grasp of Darkness](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grasp of Darkness), your ability to ignore regeneration is irrelevant.

Posted By: CrazyLou (12/16/2010 7:17:34 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The flavour of this card is really interesting to me. Its almost like a creature card (the last troll), but rather than participating in the battle, he is simply watching over your creatures from a distance. This is cool because trolls are supposed to be all but extinct on Mirrodin so having even one troll creature in the set would have seemed like one too many, but the creature type still gets to exist in a subtle way via enchantment instead. So yeah, in a weird sort of way this card's flavour has blurred the line for me between what can constitute a 'creature' and what can constitute an 'enchantment' flavour-wise. The nod to Troll Ascetic only heightens its aesthetic qualities.   
Line-blurring makes me happy ^\_^
posts.html:

posts.post_content: Everyone here has commented on the affects this enchantment has on the enchantments controllers creatures. What about the opponents??? "Regenerate target creature," could regenerate an opponents creatures as well. Isn't a side affect of regeneration the creature becoming tapped? Correct me if I'm wrong, but this looks like a very novel way to tap your opponents creatures as well. Broken indeed! 5/5 for me.

 You are an idiot.
